name: Slimeagedon
description:
Game made for MiniJam 100

Game is about little slime that want to eat everything
but if he eats too much, then he will EXPLODE
goal is to get as much points as possible

Theme: Overload

SoundEffects made in:
https://sfxr.me
Music made in:
Bosca Ceoil

Type in comments your best highscore :))
